# samsungcloudplatform_iam_role (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "samsungcloudplatform_iam_role" "my_role" {
  role_id = "ROLE-XXXXX"
}

output "result_my_role" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatform_iam_role.my_role
}
```
